price: 13. Arrin kaloo aad jeceshihiinna (wuu idin siin) gargaar xag Alle ah iyo guul dhow. Ee u bishaaree mu’miniinta.
arabic: وَأُخۡرَىٰ تُحِبُّونَهَاۖ نَصۡرٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَفَتۡحٞ قَرِيبٞۗ وَبَشِّرِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-ukh'rā tuḥibbūnahā naṣrun mina al-lahi wafatḥun qarībun wabashiri al-mu'minīna
